context: Commvault Systems, Inc. is a data protection and management software company focused on backup, recovery, and data management across cloud and on-premises. Hybrid cloud data protection. Competing with Veeam, Cohesity, Rubrik.

competitors.name: Veeam
competitors.notes: Leading backup and recovery solution particularly strong in VMware environments

competitors.name: Veritas Technologies
competitors.notes: Enterprise data management and protection solutions

competitors.name: Cohesity
competitors.notes: Modern data management platform with backup, recovery, and data services

competitors.name: Rubrik
competitors.notes: Cloud data management with focus on ransomware recovery and compliance

competitors.name: Dell EMC Data Protection
competitors.notes: Comprehensive backup and recovery solutions from Dell Technologies

competitors.name: IBM Spectrum Protect
competitors.notes: Enterprise backup and recovery solution for diverse environments

competitors.name: Druva
competitors.notes: Cloud-native data protection and management as a service

competitors.name: Acronis
competitors.notes: Cyber protection solutions combining backup and cybersecurity
